attributes.action: Repeal EU law which protects vaccine manufacturers from liability
attributes.additional_details: Stop UK vaccine damage payments which has paid out over £74 million since 1978.
attributes.background: Remove the protections given to companies such as Pfizer, giving them immunity from being sued by patients in the event of any complications.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562412

If you would also like the Government to end the Vaccine Damage Payment scheme, you could start a new petition requesting this.
